name: Text Based Adventure (Patrick)
description:
Made for the Ludum Dare gamejam in 48 hours in April 2018.

https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/41/text-based-action-rpg

This is a short Action RPG that is definitely Text based.

Traverse through 5 Levels finally reaching the evil Z - who wants to rule the alphabet. Click to shoot - or use your Xbox controller (slightly more challenging).

In each of the 5 levels you will find a power node. Destroying these will weaken the final boss.

Try to defeat Z at the end and go through again in Challenge Mode - more enemies, and they’re not fooling around!
